attributes.action: Make people who eat severely unhealthy diets/smoke/drink excessive alcohol pay for some of the NHS charges if their health problem has been self induced.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If people choose to harm their bodies and then cause illness, why should they be entitled to free NHS care? The NHS is overstretched and there are lots of people who are waiting for treatment who have done nothing to get sick. Why should these people wait so long, beacuse the waiting list is full of obese patients etc..
